summary: "I Love Lucy" is an old American TV comedy about Lucy Ricardo, a New York housewife who loves show business. She often tries funny schemes to be part of her husband Ricky's nightclub acts. The show starred Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz and was very popular, becoming the most-watched show in the U.S. for four of its six seasons. It won five Emmy Awards and is still loved today, with millions watching re-runs every year. It was also the first TV show to use a live studio audience and an ensemble cast, making it super influential.
title: I Love Lucy
